<<<imagines it>>>
  hmm
  <<<imagines bills face with loved ones gathered round taking turns speaking>>>
   
  kinda like the waltons with a twist =)
   
  at least you still HAVE family hour, not many can say that. Happy thanksgiving to you and your family too!
   
  Misty

psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:
          Maybe we're just a little unconventional in our household, but most of 
us here are pretty open to the idea of the multiverse. Gathering in a 
circle around our Frank's Box is our idea of quality family time. The 
messages are relevent, the interest is high, and we're very well 
grounded and do not let the tricksters push us around.

Happy Thanksgiving from our home to yours. -Bill
